description: Dark colours and a modern decor are the main features of this excellent restaurant which occupies two floors and is highly recommended for its gourmet Japanese specialities. Cooked and raw dishes feature on the menu, plus there’s a quicker “combo formula” available at lunchtime.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
